Title: Relates to registration and special plates for severely disabled veterans
Summary: Provides an exemption from registration and special plate fees for severely disabled veterans; includes veterans rated as 60% disabled by the US department of veterans affairs; removes the requirement of service in a time of war.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to registration and special plates for severely disabled veterans
